Articles.Content: What graphic setting is needed to get shadows of the craft to appear on the ground while attempting landings?  I run a fairly minimalist setup, and I've had it in previous installs, but it's always luck when I figure it out.  Right now it only appears when the ship is ~10m from the ground.   Not very useful.

I've got my graphics at default since my hardware upgrade, and I get shadows when I'm close enough to the ground to see them.  For command pods under parachute (which is the only thing I fly where I can spare the concentration to look), I start seeing the shadow when I'm 200-500 m above ground (depending on local time of day).
